El comportamiento del cartón ondulado: The behavior of corrugated board and the box, once manufactured, is directly related to the following parameters, which must be taken into account.
Gramaje y características de los papeles: Basis weight and characteristics of the papers used
Mala calidad: cartón abarquillado, húmed: Poor quality: warped, damp cardboard, honeycomb
- Combinaciones de flutingsde alto grama: - Combinations of high basis weight flutings with low basis weight liners will frequently produce problems of liner paper breakage during the die-cutting process.
GRAMAJES Y CARACTERÍSTICAS DE LOS PAPELE: BASIS WEIGHTS AND CHARACTERISTICS OF THE PAPERS
Dificultades en la fabricación posterior: Difficulties in the subsequent manufacturing of the box
Hay que ser cuidadosos con el diseño de: Care must be taken with the design of paper combinations that are very unbalanced in basis weight and technical characteristics.
- Composiciones kraft, con linersrecicla: - Kraft compositions, with low-quality recycled liners, such as TL3.
Además debido a las diferentes caracterí: Additionally, due to the different mechanical characteristics and moisture of the very unbalanced papers, problems occur in the corrugator:
COMPOSICIONES EQUILIBRADAS EN GRAMAJE S: BALANCED COMPOSITIONS IN BASIS WEIGHT ARE THOSE IN WHICH:
EL PESO DE LOS LINERS OSCILA ENTRE EL 65: THE WEIGHT OF THE LINERS RANGES BETWEEN 65-70%
EN ESTE CASO EL FLUTING ES EL 33,3% DE L: IN THIS CASE, THE FLUTING IS 33.3% OF THE COMPOSITION
POR EJEMPLO, UNA COMBINACIÓN COMPUESTA P: FOR EXAMPLE, A COMBINATION COMPOSED OF TL130/FL130/TL130
EL PESO DE LOS FLUTINGS OSCILA ENTRE EL: THE WEIGHT OF THE FLUTINGS RANGES BETWEEN 30-35%
SERÍA UNA COMBINACIÓN EQUILIBRADA: IT WOULD BE A BALANCED COMBINATION
EN UNA COMBINACIÓN QUE LLEVE KL 125 Y TL: IN A COMBINATION THAT INCLUDES KL 125 AND TL OF 130
SE CONSIDERA QUE UNA COMBINACIÓN ESTA EQ: IT IS CONSIDERED THAT A COMBINATION IS BALANCED WHEN IT IS MADE UP OF PAPERS OF DIFFERENT TYPES, KL AND TEST, FOR EXAMPLE, IF THE GRAMMAGE DIFFERENCE DOES NOT EXCEED 25% OF THE VALUE OF THE LOWEST GRAMMAGE.
COMPOSICIONES EQUILIBRADAS EN GRAMAJE,: BALANCED COMPOSITIONS IN GRAMMAGE, WITH DIFFERENT TYPES OF PAPERS
EN UNA COMBINACION QUE LLEVE TL125 Y TL1: IN A COMBINATION THAT INCLUDES TL125 AND TL185
COMPOSICIONES EQUILIBRADAS EN GRAMAJE C: BALANCED COMPOSITIONS IN GRAMMAGE WITH THE SAME TYPE OF PAPERS
SE CONSIDERA QUE UNA COMBINACIÓN ESTA EQ: IT IS CONSIDERED THAT A COMBINATION IS BALANCED WHEN IT IS MADE UP OF PAPERS OF THE SAME TYPE AND CLASS, IF THE MAXIMUM GRAMMAGE DIFFERENCE DOES NOT EXCEED 50% OF THE VALUE OF THE LOWEST GRAMMAGE.

Un 10% de aplastamiento, pueden producir: A 10% crushing can cause losses of up to 15% of the dynamic compression value or BCT of the box

Paletizado y apilado incorrecto del cart: Incorrect palletizing and stacking of the cardboard
La balanza halógena es una herramienta i: The halogen scale is an essential tool for the final measurement of cardboard moisture
En unas determinadas condiciones ambient: Under certain environmental conditions, paper reaches its moisture equilibrium with a curve that can be absorbent, as in the case of the graph. This cardboard will have been manufactured with low moisture, for example 5.5%, reaching the final equilibrium around 6.5%
En las mismas condiciones ambientales, v: Under the same environmental conditions, we see how cardboard manufactured with higher moisture than in the previous case, for example 8.5%, yields the same, with a curve different from absorption, having a final equilibrium moisture value of 7.5%
La humedad final de equilibrio es difer: The final equilibrium moisture is different depending on whether the cardboard was manufactured wet or dry
Si fabricamos cartones con una humedad b: If we manufacture cardboard with low moisture, they will be conditioned to a lower moisture than they should correspond to, resulting in rigid and less elastic cardboards that will make them difficult to die-cut.
Pérdidas de características mecánicas de: Loss of mechanical characteristics of the cardboard and BCT
En caso de fabricar cartones muy húmedos: In case of manufacturing very humid cardboards, the final conditioning humidity will be excessively high and we will obtain wetter cardboards with all the problems this entails:

La planitud es otra de las característic: Flatness is another of the important characteristics of the sheet. Lack of flatness will give us the following problems

Sin restos de papel producidos en los co: Without paper remnants produced in the cuts, it is essential that they are clean cuts
Que no existan hilos del tipo cabello de: That there are no threads of the type angel hair
Exenta de rayas, arrugas y pliegues , pr: Free of stripes, wrinkles, and folds, produced by dry starch on the drying table of the fluting machine and wear of the blanket staple
La superficie del cartón ondulado debe c: The surface of the fluted cardboard must meet the following characteristics:
Perfectamente lisa y sin nido de abeja ,: Perfectly smooth and without honeycomb, produced by excess starch and heat in the fluting
Exenta de impurezas y manchas , por ejem: Free of impurities and stains, for example those produced by the presence of waxes or paraffins in the paper
EL ALMIDÓN EN LAS COLAS PARA FABRICACIÓN: STARCH IN GLUES FOR CORRUGATED BOARD MANUFACTURING
PRODUCTOS QUE INTERVIENEN EN LA PREPARAC: PRODUCTS INVOLVED IN THE PREPARATION OF A STARCH GLUE
FORMA NATURAL DE ALMACENAR ENERGÍA POR F: NATURAL FORM OF STORING ENERGY THROUGH PHOTOSYNTHESIS
Los almidones de maíz y trigo son los ma: Corn and wheat starches are the most commonly used for glue manufacturing
Se presentaen forma de polvoblancode tex: It appears in the form of white powder with a smooth texture
Económico (aprox. 5% del precio del cart: Economical (approx. 5% of the price of corrugated board)
Ambas se componen de cadenas largas de m: Both are composed of long chains of glucose molecules.
La amilosay amilopectinason dos molécula: Amylose and amylopectin are two molecules that form starch (complex carbohydrates).
Sobre el 25% de la mayoría de los almido: About 25% of most starches is amylose and 75% is amylopectin.
Son almidones caros y usados para el peg: They are expensive starches used for gluing high grammage papers, such as agriculture...
Existen almidones modificados por medios: There are starches modified by physical and chemical means, phosphorylation and dextrinization, and also genetically modified to increase the amylose content and consequently its adhesive power.
La capacidad o fuerza del pegado de un: The capacity or strength of the adhesion of a starch adhesive is defined by the amylose content of that starch.
RETIENE EL AGUA PARA EL ALMIDÓN CRUDO (A: RETAINS WATER FOR RAW STARCH (ABSORBS 20 TIMES ITS WEIGHT IN WATER)
AL GELATINIZAR FORMA PARTE DEL ADHESIVO: UPON GELATINIZATION, IT BECOMES PART OF THE ADHESIVE
ABSORBE EL AGUA PARA EL INICIO DEL PEGAD: ABSORBS WATER FOR THE START OF ADHESION
CONTROLA LA ABSORCION DE AGUA DEL MEDIUM: CONTROLS THE WATER ABSORPTION OF THE MEDIUM
SIRVE DE SOPORTE Y TRANSPORTE AL ALMIDÓN: SERVES AS SUPPORT AND TRANSPORT FOR RAW STARCH
EL ALMIDÓN SE PUEDE SUMINISTRAR A GRANEL: STARCH CAN BE SUPPLIED IN BULK, BIG BAG, SILO
USO EN LA PLANTA DEL ALMIDÓN: USE OF STARCH IN THE PLANT
Sistema con cabrestante y rosca de alime: System with winch and feeding screw to Preparation tank
USO DEL ALMIDÓN EN BIG BAGS: USE OF STARCH IN BIG BAGS

Pagamos agua a precio de almidón: We pay for water at starch price
Mide la resistencia a la sosa del almidó: Measures the starch's resistance to soda and can affect the gel point.
